name: Nell A. KOPLOVITZ, Appellant, v. CHISUK EMUNA CEMETERY, Appellee

judges: Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY and NIX, JJ.
MANDERINO, J., took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: Nell A. KOPLOVITZ, Appellant, v. CHISUK EMUNA CEMETERY, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER OF THE COURT
PER CURIAM.
Decree affirmed. Each side to pay own costs.
MANDERINO, J., took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Archie V. Diveglia, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Arthur L. Goldberg, Harrisburg, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
339 A.2d 762
Nell A. KOPLOVITZ, Appellant, v. CHISUK EMUNA CEMETERY, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued May 5, 1975.
Decided July 7, 1975.
Archie V. Diveglia, Harrisburg, for appellant.
Arthur L. Goldberg, Harrisburg, for appellee.
Before JONES, C. J., and EAGEN, O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY and NIX, JJ.
